page.title: 14LILLESHALL SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: Lilleshall Hall National Sports' Centre is situated in the Hall once owned by the Duke of Sutherland and his family. The Centre still has much of the character of the old hall but has been much extended and modernised in the last 10 years. It now caters for a vast range of sporting activities including, soccer, tennis, badminton, squash and gymnastics for use by the local population and more especially for people who wish to attend courses in the skills and management of specific sports. Many of the facilities are housed in indoor sports' halls with changing facilities and social amenities including a bar and residential quarters. The grounds are extensive and include examples of many old, rare and beautiful trees. Next door to the Centre is the privately owned Lilleshall Golf Club.
